EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Data Microservices in the Cloud_Q316.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: 9/29 Webinar reminder - Data Microservices in the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for tomorrow's webinar Data Microservices in the Cloud on Thursday, September 29, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, September 29, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}} Time: 7:00AM PDT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1261100/B7FA041FE570E3AA78D0D9D4CFED0B85]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
